name: Space Grind (Artemachq)
description:
SPACE GRIND

 Welcome to Space Grind! Control spaceships in this vast universe, where each game is a unique adventure.

 Collect a collection of ships and all your allies, and then fight off the impending threat that hangs over the entire galaxy. You are the only hero who can help. Good luck!

 Space Grind is an arcade simulator in pixel style, in which you will become a real captain of a spaceship.

The game offers the opportunity to choose different styles of ships, complete daily tasks to get rewards and improve various characteristics of the hero and your entire team.

The power of the cosmos is only in your hands!

  Main features:

  • Conquer the universe and earn currency for the development of your ship.
  • Complete daily tasks and earn twice as many rewards.
  • Choose any ship you like and go on a new "voyage".
  • Upgrade your ships and stand out from the rest of the pilots.
  • Open chests and get rewards that will help in any situation.
  • Upgrade and communicate with your team (doctor, mechanic, engineer and pilot).

 Tired of playing FARM games, CLICKERS and other similar games? Then you've definitely come to the right place.

 Space Grind is a beautiful and relaxing pixel-style game about flying a spaceship in the boundless space. Save the universe from the asteroid rain, fight bosses, get rewards and achievements. A lot of different ships, differing in shape and coloring, you will definitely find something that you will like.

 Improve a lot of characteristics of your ship, upgrade your clan (wing) to get even more opportunities in the modification of your spaceship.

 Bonuses in chests, bonuses for completing tasks, bonuses for daily entry, yes, this game is just full of bonuses and you will definitely not be left without currency!

 Perfect for children and adults.

 Play everywhere: in the subway, in a minibus, in a taxi, at school, at home and even at work.

 A great option for all generations!

Note:

Space Grind is an absolutely free game created to meet the needs of users. However, some game bonuses can be purchased through viewing ads, they will help speed up your promotion and make external improvements.

According to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 3 years old to play or download Space Grind.

To get the full experience, go to Google Play 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ArtStyleProd.SpaceGrind

Each donating person can realize his personality, nickname, idea or something else:

After your donation, write in the comments, private messages or directly in the donation, after which the developer will contact you.

If you want to support the developer
